T02D3571:202b-1: sha ta bhu ja ku ru kulle s'a dha nam /
T02D3571:202b-3: rigs byed ma phyag drug ma'i sgrub thabs //
T02D3571:202b-4: ku ru kulle la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3571:202b-5: dang por sngags pas stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
T02D3571:203a-0: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bcom ldan 'das ma dang sangs rgyas @203a * //
T02D3571:203a-1: dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams gdan drangs nas mchod pa dang /
T02D3571:203a-2: skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D3571:203a-3: de nas stong pa nyid du mos pa bya zhing /
T02D3571:203a-4: sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D3571:203a-5: aom yig las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la
T02D3571:203a-6: ram yig 'od zer gyi phreng ba dang bcas pa
T02D3571:203a-7: rnam par bsam zhing de yongs su gyur pa las
T02D3571:203a-8: bcom ldan 'das ma rigs byed ma blta bar bya'o
T02D3571:203a-9: // padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa dang nyi
T02D3571:203a-10: ma'i gdan la rdo rje skyil krung gis nye bar
T02D3571:203a-12: g-yas dang g-yon gyi phyag dang po gnyis kyis 'jig
T02D3571:203a-13: rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya 'dzin
T02D3571:203a-14: pa / gnyis pa'i g-yas pa dang /
T02D3571:203a-15: g-yon pa dag gis lcags kyu dang /
T02D3571:203a-16: autpal la dmar po bsnams pa'o //
T02D3571:203a-17: phyag lhag ma gnyis kyis mda' dang gzhu rna ba'i rtsar 'gengs pa /
T02D3571:203a-18: na bza' dmar po mnabs pa /
T02D3571:203a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa lngas dbu brgyan pa /
T02D3571:203a-20: bsgrub bya'i snying gar autpal dmar po'i ze'u 'bru la
T02D3571:203a-21: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la ram yig kha dog dmar
T02D3571:203a-23: rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas shing de'i snying gar
T02D3571:203a-24: lcags kyus phug ste bkug nas snying gar zhugs shing
T02D3571:203a-25: autpal dmar po'i mde'u can gyi mdas bsgrub bya yang
T02D3571:203a-26: nas yang du 'gugs shing sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3571:203a-28: aom ku ru kulle hr'i:che ge mo bdag gi dbang du gyis shig ho:sv'a h'a /
T02D3571:203a-29: de nas de la bsgrub bya mos pa'i dbang du
T02D3571:203a-30: byas nas rkang pa'i drung du lhung bar blta zhing
T02D3571:203a-31: bskul bar bya'o // de lta bsu brgya byin yang dbang du byed do //
